Temp Thread For Combinable Traits
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Temp Thread For Combinable Traits
By John Hawley on Monday, December 31, 2001 - 01:04 pm:

We have started a thread on combining and we are including the descriptions of combinable traits. If you would like to contribute, post here and a mod will add it to the thread and add you to our Thanks To credits.

By DigMoshMogi on Thursday, January 10, 2002 - 02:44 pm:

Today I backed up my save and went crazy using GS. I used trait items and I found out that if you use trait items fire orb, thunder orb, water orb, earth orb, and ice orb all 5 traits will combine into fairy know. This also worked the same as breeding to get gold gift and dusk aura using gali mask and joker mask.

By DigMoshMogi on Thursday, January 10, 2002 - 03:46 pm:

Oh yeah. I also have some traits that dont combine into one. I had them all on one zan and they stayed separate traits. Heat resist, electric resist, water resist, wind resist, cold resist, and magic resist. I had all of them on my zan and they stayed separate traits.
